# Data visualization on "**Ship Performance Clustering Dataset**"

## 1. Import Data:





::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(tidyverse,haven)
ship_data <- read_csv("/Users/geloliu/Gelo-608/ISSS608/Take home Ex/Take-home_Ex1/data/Ship_Performance_Dataset.csv")
```
:::





### Check the structure of data:





::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
str(ship_data)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
spc_tbl_ [2,736 × 18] (S3: spec_tbl_df/tbl_df/tbl/data.frame)

 $ Maintenance_Status     : chr [1:2736] "Critical" "Good" "Fair" "Fair" ...
 $ Speed_Over_Ground_knots: num [1:2736] 12.6 10.4 20.7 21.1 13.7 ...

 $ Weekly_Voyage_Count    : num [1:2736] 1 6 9 1 8 7 3 6 8 2 ...
 $ Average_Load_Percentage: num [1:2736] 93.8 93.9 96.2 66.2 80 ...
```

### **Data cleansing**:





::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ship_data <- ship_data %>% drop_na()
ship_data <- ship_data %>% distinct()
```
:::
